start.speaker: Pixel
start.text: Space shooter time! We'll build an epic galactic battle scene by scene.
start.followUp: First up: your title screen that'll launch players into space!

titleBackground.speaker: Pixel
titleBackground.text: Let's set the cosmic mood! Pick a space background with stars and nebulas.

titleShipPreview.speaker: Pixel
titleShipPreview.text: Now let's pick your spaceship! It'll fly across the title screen.

titleMusic.speaker: Pixel
titleMusic.text: Every space epic needs dramatic music! Pick something intense and cosmic.

gameplayMovement.speaker: Pixel
gameplayMovement.text: Time for gameplay! How should your spaceship move?

options.text: Modern twin-stick - move and aim separately

gameplayEnemies.speaker: Pixel
gameplayEnemies.text: What kind of alien enemies will challenge your pilot?

gameplayShooting.speaker: Pixel
gameplayShooting.text: Pew pew! Time to set up your weapon systems!

gameplayPowerups.speaker: Pixel
gameplayPowerups.text: Power-ups make space battles more exciting! Pick some boost items.

gameplayEffects.speaker: Pixel
gameplayEffects.text: Explosions in space! Let's add some particle effects!

gameplayScore.speaker: Pixel
gameplayScore.text: How should we track the pilot's progress?

bossSetup.speaker: Pixel
bossSetup.text: Every space shooter needs an epic boss battle! Pick your big bad.

victoryScreen.speaker: Pixel
victoryScreen.text: Victory! How should we celebrate defeating the alien invasion?

compile.speaker: Pixel
compile.text: Your space shooter is ready to launch! All systems are go!
compile.followUp: Ready to see your galactic adventure in action?

playGame.speaker: Pixel
playGame.text: Mission accomplished, pilot! Your space shooter is live!
